content: If you have a product scanning incoming mail try disabling that feature or product. History shows most of these sorts of issues are caused by failed antivirus products.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Are you using IMAP? What is the retention period of junk with your chosen mail provider. Most of mine the provider deletes junk/spam after 14 days. But there is some variability provider to provider.
creator: MattAuSupport

You might want to have a look at the developer toolbox (Ctrl+Shift+I) in the inspector
